1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.2.2:
All monsters (both modded and vanilla) that attack the player now also attack the human NPCs
Added "monstersAttackHumanNPCs" config option
Fixed some minor errors in the English localization
You can not move backpack items from their slots while you are inside a backpack (the item, not the block). This applies to all the backpack items, not only the one the player opened. This should prevent potential item duplication.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.2.1:
Fixed the "Dropbox" advancement being fired even if you did not open the airdrop
Fixed the inventory slots in the airdrop GUI being offset down by a couple of pixels
Added 2 small ruins structures
Added Russian localization (thanks to Nep Games)
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.2.0:
Added new "hotel" structure
Added "damageDecayRate" config option
Damaged blocks now, by default, decay (or heal) over time
Added "zombieKnockbackResistance" config option
Disabled cameras no longer rotate
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.1.6: Fixed a tiny bug that made the generic/random hordes not actually spawn the zombies
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.1.5:
Blocks can have multiple repair items
Added config/sevendaystomine/repair.json, that can be used to add (or remove) block repairs
Assigned repair items to certain blocks (for example, the Grass Block)
Particles should not crash the game on collision with the cars
Hopefully fixed the custom particles crashing the game on collision with the cars (blocks)
Fixed the boolean data type in Ni
Added the modulo operator to Ni
Added boolean negation to Ni
Fixed minor bugs in Ni
Made the electrical blocks technically use the Forge Energy System, realistically this does not change anything, but it might make it a bit easier for other mods to communicate with my devices
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.1.4:
The Epidemic game should not crash the game anymore when putting the mouse cursor on the very edge of the map.
The street decorator now checks whether sandy biomes do actually have vanilla sand as the surface block, (hopefully) preventing crashes when using mods that have custom sand
Minor en_us.lang changes
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.1.3:
Fixed the "Missing NBT" message being fired even if the NBT is in fact present
Added new textures by Krapsy
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.1.2:
Fixed the "balance modifier" config option not affecting zombies' health
Fixed the bug that caused computers that were mined using an auger (and maybe even other tools?) not to be actually mined
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.1.0:
Added config options allowing to alter the weight, minimal and maximal number of (hopefully) all the zombies.
Added a single config option controlling the health and damages in the mod - balanceModifier
Added the wasteland-biomes only landfill structure
Decreased the weight of the city maps a bit
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.0.2:
Fixed the -1 Days to Die Advancement, so it is affected by the custom number of the infection stages from the config file
Added the "disableFoodStacking" option to the config file
Added the "zombieCorpses" option to the config file
Added the "immersiveBlockBreakingModifier" option to the config file
Fixed the Catwalk Stairs model when upside down
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.0.1:
Fixed Mossy Brick Stairs recipe
Made all melee weapons children of ItemSword
Rebalanced harvest levels of tools
Added "tool class" values to the tools, so they are recognized as tools by other mods
